title: 2.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
Write a Python program that uses the turtle module and draws some colorful patterns. Make sure to use
● at least two for or while loops;
● at least one if statement;
● multiple colors.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
